result.purpose: Responsible for providing services related to decoding Ethereum transactions and managing digital signatures.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating services related to Ethereum transaction decoding and signature management, with a focus on maintainability and testability.

internal/domains/web3/services/decoder.g.purpose: Provides a service for decoding Ethereum transactions, calls, and events.

internal/domains/web3/services/decoder_n.purpose: Normalizes decoded parameters from Ethereum transactions.

internal/domains/web3/services/decoder_t.purpose: Unit tests for decoding Ethereum call signatures and associated data.

internal/domains/web3/services/metrics.g.purpose: Defines metrics for monitoring service performance in a wallet proxy application using Prometheus.

internal/domains/web3/services/signature.purpose: Provides a service for managing digital signatures in a web3 context.
